talk1001:
<clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff> are pitiful beings who have lost their
way home and wander the depths of
this land.
Good... Evil... That's the futile perspective
of narrow-minded beings. There is no
such distinction in wandering spirits.
You have already obtained <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff>...
talk1014:
Is that so...


Visit me again if you decide to offer <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff>.


I will grant you suitable compensation.
talk1027:
But it seems one of my brethren cannot
make use of his power.

What could this mean?
talk1002: Yes... Oh, this is indeed a <clr:0000>Poe<clr:ffff>.
talk1015:
I acknowledge your offering...<sp:5:0:0> I will tell
you of the <clr:0000>location of one of my brethren<clr:ffff>
in the depths of the land.
talk1003:
Yes... Oh, this is indeed a <clr:0000>Poe<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>


What pitiful beings these are. They have
lost their way home, and wander the
depths of this land.
talk1016:
Seek out wandering spirits for my
brethren in the depths of this land.
talk1004:
...


I have returned the lost spirit to the
afterlife where it belongs.

Since I was brought here to the surface,
I have been unable to return Poes to the
afterlife.
Because of you, I can assist them once
again. You should take this.
talk1018: I no longer have anything to offer you.
talk1006:
...


Have you...encountered my brethren in
the depths of the land?

Wait just a moment...
talk1019:
It seems you do not have enough Poes
to offer...
talk1007:
My <clr:0000>brethren<clr:ffff>, whose spirits reside in
statues far larger than mine, are in the
depths of this land.
If you encounter my <clr:0000>brethren<clr:ffff>, try offering
Poes to them.

I will tell you the <clr:0000>location of one of
my brethren<clr:ffff>.

I no longer have anything to offer you.

talk1020:
Offer <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff> to me. They are spirits that
ought to return to the afterlife.
talk1021:
Go to the location indicated on
your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>...
talk1023:
If you offer me more <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff>, I will give you
suitable compensation.
talk1024:
I can sense the <clr:0000>locations of my brethren<clr:ffff>.


If you offer me <clr:0000><sp:2:2:36:300041006d006f0073005300740061007400750065005f005700680065007200650049007300500072006900630065003100ffff00cd> Poes<clr:ffff>, I will tell you
<clr:0000>where to find one of them<clr:ffff>.
talk1011:
You who stand before me... Offer up <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff>
so that I may return them to the afterlife.
talk1012:
Seek my brethren in the depths of
this land...
talk1000:
You who stand before me...


I am one who returns <clr:0000>Poes<clr:ffff> to the afterlife
where they belong.
talk1026:
You appear to already know the locations
of all of my brethren...
talk1013:
Visit me again when you have an
abundance of wandering spirits.
